description: This file defines the NoteResponse class, a data transfer object (DTO) used for sending note data in responses within a REST API. It contains fields for note ID, title, content, tags, creation, and update timestamps, along with constructors and getter/setter methods.

classes.name: NoteResponse
classes.description: A data transfer object representing a note in API responses, including metadata like timestamps and tags.

methods.name: NoteResponse
methods.description: Default constructor for creating an empty NoteResponse object.

methods.name: NoteResponse
methods.description: Parameterized constructor for initializing all fields of NoteResponse.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the unique identifier of the note.

methods.name: setId
methods.description: Sets the unique identifier of the note.

methods.name: getTitle
methods.description: Returns the title of the note.

methods.name: setTitle
methods.description: Sets the title of the note.

methods.name: getContent
methods.description: Returns the content/body of the note.

methods.name: setContent
methods.description: Sets the content/body of the note.

methods.name: getTags
methods.description: Returns the list of tags associated with the note.

methods.name: setTags
methods.description: Sets the list of tags for the note.

methods.name: getCreatedAt
methods.description: Returns the creation timestamp of the note.

methods.name: setCreatedAt
methods.description: Sets the creation timestamp of the note.

methods.name: getUpdatedAt
methods.description: Returns the last updated timestamp of the note.

methods.name: setUpdatedAt
methods.description: Sets the last updated timestamp of the note.
